item.description:
A few friends and I have been doing the Coastal Wine Trail this year, and I thought it would be fun to continue the pattern with a meetup!
The Coastal Wine Trail connects 9 wineries between Cape Cod and Westerly, RI. By visiting each winery, you can earn a stamp on a booklet that you then mail in (or turn in to a winery) to earn a chance to win a cruise, a getaway to the cape, or free wine! More details here: http://coastalwinetra...

For today's meetup, we're going to visit Newport Vineyards in Middletown, RI, and Greenvale Vineyards in Portsmouth, RI. We'll follow our wine tasting with a late lunch at Fieldstones in Portsmouth.

Newport Vineyards has daily tours at 1pm, so let's meet in the store at 12:45.
Here is Newport Vineyards' website: http://www.newportvin...
It doesn't say on their website but I think the tour + tasting is $10 (incl. wine glass).

We'll then head 5 min away to Greenvale Vineyards, which has daily tours at 2pm.
Here is Greenvale's website: http://www.greenvale....
Tours + tastings are $9 and include the wine glass.

Then we'll drive about 10 min to Fieldstones: http://www.atlanticgr...

It'll be a fun afternoon! :) Hope to see you there!
This event is cross-listed with WINGS. Please RSVP on only 1 meetup site.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our group in the store. I'm tall, shoulder-length hair, thick glasses.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: South Coast Wine Trail: RI edition
